KELVIN RAYMONDS

kelvin <kelvinray@excite.com> wrote: 
Dear Mr. Johnny Knoxville

My company is a customer of Mr. Pu Ching We are making a payment of $36,580USD
to them, and he has told me that you will be recieving this funds on his
behalf.I am requesting for your information that I will issue the check in.
Please This will include Your Name Or Company name, and your complete mailing
address with zip/postal code.I will be expecting to hear from you promtly.

Yours truly

Dr. kelvin Raymonds

KELVIN RAYMONDS

Attn. Johnny,

I will like to let you know that I have notified our accounts department to
prepare a check of worth $36,000 to be sent to you, I will let you know when
the funds is ready.I really appreciate your patience, please help me explain to
Mr. Chu Ping about the delays. Have a nice day.

Best Regards,

Dr. Kelvin Raymonds
To our surprise, CHU PING (who is not Chu Ping and not Chinese and not in China) is still trying to scam Johnny (who is not Johnny, but you knew that).

June: 
Amazingly, Mr. "Ping" keeps coming back.
Chu patiently repeats the payment information.

messages.body:
Received: from  

Dear Sir,
I am very happy to write you this mail.As part of our company policy we are fully obliged towards ensuring that our various representatives are fully briefed about the nature of job which we are offering to well meaning individuals.
With this i will start by saying that,i commend your effort and regards which you have shown.So also,i will like to inform you that our organization is ready to ensure that you are furnished with necessary support and information,geared towards ensuring a viable working relationship.
I start first by introducing our company ALPHA MATRIX GROUP OF COMPANY.We are a registered company with over 7 branches across Asia.We are specialized in the importation and exportation of raw materials,ranging from Agricultural products,Agro-chemicals and solid minerals.We also do training of staffs and rendering well meaning services.
We over the years  have had a good market for our products,which range from cereals,latex,wofam,precious stones,palm products.We have resolved over the years to employ meaningful strategies to achieve a very outstanding result in the area of marketing.And also get our products overseas without hitches.With our efficient team of workers and various outlets working effortlessly round the clock.We have been able to export products to Europe and America.
We have recently come up with a company strategy geared towards offering jobs to God fearing individuals.WHO will stand as representatives for us.This has enable us cut down the number of staffs working overseas for us.
As a representative your duty is to assist in the negotiation of price of products and also to help make claims to our funds,which are with our numerous creditors.All expenses to this regard will be taking care of by us.Also all successful transaction willwill attract a 10% commission from that  particular transaction.
All information regarding the particular transaction will be supported with enough and sufficient document to enable make proper verifications.Documents to be forwarded to you include INVOICES,STATEMENT OF ACCOUNT AND RECEIPTS.
So please send to me your Bio-Data or recent Id.
Your data is to be used for proper documentation.So also you are requested to send you personal information in the following respect.
NAME:
SEX:
AGE:
MARITAL STATUS:
CONTACT ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE:
FAX:
CURRENT PLACE OF WORK:
Once this is completed we will send to our various costumers close to you for them to make negotiations behalf of us.Note outstanding representatives are to get from us welfare packages to boost performance.So also all interested representative can book for any of our seminars and enlightenment campaign that are held all year round.
You are to make all correspondence to this email address,also we entertain various question about  our company where you are finding difficulty.For the now our team of engineers are working to upgrade our website.So as soon as it is completed i will furnish you with the web address.In terms of making future claims you are to make arrangements with our costumers how the funds are to be remitted to you.Also you are advised to always add pressure on our associates to pay up in time.
So do write your response to us as there is still a great chance for you to be among the lucky person shortlisted for our next transaction.
NOTE:We do not entertain people with questionable characters.
My best regards,and God blessing.
Yours Faithfully,
Chu Ping.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Johnny, 
How are you doing today.I regret that all effort that you have put in towards ensuring a hitch free exercise has not yielded anything positive.But i can assure that if you do bear with me i will be able to arrange for you to be short listed for our next collection. 
I also will like to use this medium to inform you that,although payments of this sort can be bared at times.But i will assure you that our company will make sure that you will be duly compensated.Our programme runs all year round and we guaranty our customers and various client quality services.So i will like to inform you that you will not be treated differently from our other prospective REPRESENTATIVES. 
So i urge you to consolidate with our offer to be a good REPRESENTATIVE.I will dispatch to you the Name,Contact Address and Phone number of our clients oversea.This will help you make  contact with them so as to facilitate a easier collection of our funds.The Data of these client to be sent to you,are names of clients owing us. 
So i will want you to please make contact with these people,and add pressure on them to make payment on time.With this our customers will be forced to pay on time.I still want you to consider this position giving to you.As your 10% will be giving to you.I am sure that our customers will by all means co operate with you in this regards. 
Thank you and God bless.My best regards. 
Yours Faithfully, 
Chu Ping

messages.body:
Mr.Johnny, 
It is as a result of the urgency which our clients gentle request,of granting them their entitlements instantly,brought about the use of Western Union for them to receive their funds.This option emerged as a result of the board meeting held to provide our clients with a fast safe means of achieving this motion.Thus our request to you now is to comply with our already provided instructions,as some of the required assistance from you as our Representative is to channel funds already at your disposal to our clients. 
 Furthermore as a result of your non-compliance towards sub staining a virile and a hitch-free working exercise.Having tried unsuccessfully to establish a phone conversation with you,has seriously hampered our effort to en lighting you on our situation presently. 
 China as a communist country,has in place high taxation on funds leaving it's shores and also the NAFTA(National Asia Free Traders Association)zones.All these and more are some of the reasons we are soliciting with you to proficiently Represent us in the U.S.A. As your position is a very strategic and instrumental in this category. So not to hinder our motive of having a sound working relationship with you and your associates I request that we should work out a curriculum vitae to fit our various interest and our present stand. 
 Also a very vital area you have failed to acknowledge is the fact that every single representative is entitled to negotiate his or her 10% commission.You since have denied me the privilege to expatiate on these issues.Regarding your treatment meted down to our customers and clients has not improved our working relationship.I do not see any reason you went and insult our clients in Hong Kong,who was strictly adhering to instruction passed down to him to provide you with his bills so as his payments is to be realized to him.This Mr Johnny is totally unacceptable. 
 In search of proficient individuals and competent organization oversea,resulted in our employment offer to you.This has not gone down well,as you have from the unset posed a very serious dent on the imagine of our Company.Without further delay,see to it that you have your intentions known and also the current situation of things generally,regarding our ties.As I do not want a situation whereby our respectable clients are further put on hold or humiliated by our inability to meet up with their demand,as at when due. 
 See to it that our present stand is reviewed once more.If you do not deem our offer fit,i will have no other option than to send you an account with which our funds are all to be sent to,after deducting your percentage.I regret any inconvenience this might cause. 
 Also in your response try and highlight reasons behind your sharp contrast with our present arrangement.As already my clients have informed me that they have submitted their bills to you.To support your duties for us. 
 Try and see to it that our clients in Holland and Hong Kong receive their entitlements respectively.Since I have given my word that this past Monday will be the deadline for them to receive their funds.The main reason for our action to send them their funds is borne out of our resolution to boycott the use of china banks to pay our foreign staffs or debts as this will greatly reduce our profit after tax,due to taxation.So consider our position and offer as we are in need of your assistance In meeting our plight. 
Thank you and my best regards. 
Mr. Chu Ping.

Conclusions reached after a heated debate with my colleagues ended up not too favorable,as i am presently faced with the responsibility and burden of the outcome of this transaction.We agreed at the board meeting that the balance of what is remaining of the funds at your disposal,should be remitted to our Company's Liaison/Representative in Japan.For proper disbursement to our various clients abroad.We regret any form of inconvenience this might cause you.As i believe i already have explained the motive behind our wanting to send our clients their funds frst.As their welfare is our major concern.Also due to the heavy tariff placed on all outgoing funds from china.I hope you will bear with me.
Going by our judgment,on this on going exercise,we do commend your effort with which you have discharged your duty.I also want to use this opportunity to congratulate you on your selfless indulgence in this exercise.
Tough presently we are faced with stiff alternative,as our Representative in Japan has requested for a 4% payment from us so as to enable him have a smooth running of our demand.Also we are to pay a non refundable fee of $700 (seven hundred dollars),which we have paid.All these procedure has to be fulfilled so as to carry out a hitch free exercise.We have to go this way so as to enable my company secure a good profit as required by our company's goal.
The banking details below is own by our Representative.So do endeavor to remit the Balance.

BANK ; TOKYO-MITSUBISHI BANK
BRANCH; UENO BRANCH
ACC NO. 1726999
SWIFT CODE; BOTKJPJT
BANK ADDRESS; TOKYO TAITOU-KU UENO 6-1-14 JAPAN
TEL; 03-3831-1211
COMPANY NAME ; ECORECYCLE. CO., LTD
COMPANY ADDRESS TOKYO TAITOU-KU UENO 6-7-16.
TEL 03-58123163

NOTE:Scan and send me the details of the confirmation slip.For proper verification.
Thank you for your  continuous assistance.And my best regards.
Mr. Chu Ping.

messages.body:
Attn
Here is the information you need: Payments made to your account; $9,000USD. 10% of this payment is meant for Mr.Johnny Knoxville for standing as our representative who receive payments from customers. The balance 90% is for the company(Alpha Matrix),this will have to be sent via western union  to our agents in Holland and America. Here is their information you need to make the funds available to them.

PAUL DUBBELDUM
AMSTERDAM
HOLLAND

ALAN BROWN
400 SPRING ROAD
ATLANTA GEORGIA

The payments should be sent to them in equal halves that is $4,000 should be sent to each agent respectively.when sending you will have to breakdown the funds into another two equal halves ,that is send $2,000 before you send the other $2,000 this applies for both agents.If possible send from two different western union outlets. After you have done this you will then forward to me the following information:

Senders Name:
